ThingDef.label: persona Compact knife "Sabrecat"
ThingDef.description: Sabrecat is a plasteel utility knife that almost all Alanians carry, in a dire situation, it's quite effective as a weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person.
